arStrings.szText: Primary Skill: Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, increasing your attack speed with each hit.
While {c_important}Frenzy{/c} is granting {c_number}[{SF_1} * 3 * 100|%+|]{/c} bonus Attack Speed, it also generates {c_number}[SF_8]{/c} additional Fury.
While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, your other skills gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100}|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for each stack of {c_important}Frenzy{/c} you have.
You gain {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each stack of {c_important}Frenzy{/c} you currently have.
